ARTICLE.TITLE: Harrison County Commission approves new position; decides courthouse to remain closed to public for now
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Charleston, WV (25311)

Today

Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms during the evening. Partly cloudy skies after midnight. Low 66F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
